content: dna model crochet pattern by nadine borovicka http //nadinescrafts blogspot com http //nadinespatterns blogspot com/ this is a crochet pattern based on the knitting pattern by kimberly chapman at http //kimberlychapman com/crafts/knit-patterns-dna html i did have permission of the original designer to design this based on her wonderful work i am very excited she allowed me to do it because at the time i couldn t knit let alone even think of working with dpn s this is for all those crocheters out there who are scared to death of dpn s or just prefer to use a hook materials crochet hook size f worsted weight yarn i did mine in two colors but to be accurate the strands should be one color and you should have 4 colors for the connectors where the colors are paired up and don t change ex blue always with yellow and red with green tapestry needle stuffing abbreviations single_crochet single_crochet chain chain increase increase decrease decrease for the main strands tart with the magic_ring cast on 9 single_crochet join do not single_crochet in joining chain chain 1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 single_crochet join *ch1 increase single_crochet 7 decrease single_crochet 8 join repeat from * until desired length stuff tube firmly as you go along to end chain 1 single_crochet around join chain 1 decrease around 9 stitches finish stuffing and gather end closed weave in ends make two make connectors by chaining 12 leaving a long tail at the beginning to use when attaching join single_crochet in back of chain around chain 1 single_crochet around join repeat for 5 more row change color repeat for 6 row fasten_off leaving another long tail for attaching stuff firmly and sew onto long curved tubes if you want to make a strand with a left hand twist in the main strand repeat section reverse the increase and decrease so it reads ch1 decrease single_crochet 7 increase single_crochet 8 join this pattern chart and photos are property of nadine borovicka all rights reserved pattern is available for personal use only pattern may not be sold or used to produce items for sale without express written permission from the designer © copyright 2008 by nadine borovicka
